channel.title: Comments for page "Lost Weapons"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lost Weapons"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yes, same as any other ally for a new season you will get her as level 1 then have to level her up to 2 and then 3 which requires at least 6 weapons.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i meant for subsequent seasons. The first time through, you need the weapons to get her. my question, is do you need the weapons after the season in which you get her?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: If you for some strange reason prefer not to have the weapons then I suppose you can just get stalkergirl fist and then use the weapons to make pizza gear.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I've got a question on this. You need 6 weapons to get Stalkergirl lvl 3, and yet use 4 weapons to make pizza gear. do you need to re-aquire copies of at least 2 weapons just to get her?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Visit all you want. :-) On your first visit, you'll get as many rewards as you're then entitled to; if you come back later with more Lost Weapons, it'll give you whichever rewards you haven't already gotten on previous visits.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm afraid of visiting the field for the first time without all 8 Weapons (especially since I'm capable of getting them all w/o Lycoris.) Do you get to "check in" at the field at every stage of reward 1/2/4/6/8 to get them as you go or does visiting the field once prevent you from visiting it again later on with more Lost Weapons?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I assume you mean the Crusader's Sword, and it's safe to say the answer is "no." Nor do you get a second sword if stop by the field more than onceâ€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: If I sell it at the shop I can get it back visiting the lost weapons field again

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, it will give you all applicable messages in a single text box. And it's "when you click the button in the center", not "when you visit the field".

item.title: What if?
item.content:encoded:
What happens if you have more then one lost weapon when you enter the field the first time?
If for example you have 4 lost weapons when you first visit the field do you get Corrupted, Despaired and Lycoris?
